entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Local blowing snow before morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:12 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:12 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
